languages.text: {n}Женщина задумчиво смотрит на вас.{/n} "У вас — это у вас и Владайма? У него всегда есть какой-нибудь план, но далеко не всегда хороший. Почему я должна поверить в вашу идею?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина задумчиво смотрит на вас.{/n} "У Владайма всегда есть какой-нибудь план. Чем этот лучше прочих?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина задумчиво смотрит на вас.{/n} "У вас — это у вас и Владайма? У него всегда есть какой-нибудь план, но далеко не всегда хороший. Почему я должна поверить в вашу идею?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we', you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's by far not always the best plan. Why should I believe in your idea?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}她审慎地看着你。{/n}“你刚刚说‘我们’？是指你和弗拉迪姆吗？他这个人总是有计划，但他的计划显然很不靠谱。我干嘛要相信你们的计划？”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她审慎地看着你。{/n}“你刚刚说‘我们’？是指你和弗拉迪姆吗？他这个人总是有计划，但他的计划相当不靠谱。我干嘛要相信你们的计划？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}女は考え込むような表情であなたを見る。{/n}「それはつまり、あなたとヴラダイムのこと？あいつはいつも、何かしら考えがあった。でも、それが最適な計画とは限りません。どうやってあなたの計画を信用しろと？」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"

traits.locale_text: {n}女は考え込むような表情であなたを見る。{/n}「それはつまり、あなたとヴラダイムのこと？あいつはいつも、何かしら考えがあった。でも、それが最適な計画とは限りません。どうやってあなたの計画を信用しろと？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}La mujer te mira pensativa.{/n} «¿Con "nosotros" se refiere a Vladaym y a usted? Siempre tiene un plan, pero no siempre es el mejor. ¿Por qué debería creer en su idea?».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer te mira pensativa.{/n} ¿Con "nosotros" se refiere a Vladaym y a usted? Siempre tiene un plan, pero no siempre es el mejor de los planes. ¿Por qué debería creer en su idea?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Die Frau blickt dich nachdenklich an.{/n} "Und mit 'wir' meint Ihr Euch und Vladaym? Er hat immer einen Plan. Aber es ist sicherlich nicht immer der beste Plan. Warum sollte ich an Eure Idee glauben?"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau blickt dich nachdenklich an.{/n} "Und mit 'wir' meint Ihr Euch und Vladaym? Er hat immer einen Plan. Aber es ist mit Abstand nicht immer der beste Plan. Warum sollte ich an Eure Idee glauben?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}La femme vous regarde d'un air pensif.{/n} « Et par "nous", vous voulez dire vous et Vladaym ? Il a toujours un plan, en effet... mauvais, la plupart du temps. Pourquoi devrais-je vous faire confiance ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme vous regarde d'un air pensif.{/n} « Et par "nous", vous voulez dire vous et Vladaym ? Il a toujours un plan, en effet... mauvais, la plupart du temps. Pourquoi devrais-je vous faire confiance ? »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Kadın, dalgın gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "'Yaptık' derken şahsınızı ve Vladaym'ı mı kastediyorsunuz? Onun planları bitmez zaten. Pek çoğuna da iyi denemez. Fikrinize neden güveneyim?"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman looks at you pensively.{/n} "And by 'we,' you mean you and Vladaym? He always has a plan. But it's certainly not always the best plan. Why should I trust in your idea?"
